text: Welcome to the Calculus Chamber, friend.
speaker: pythagoras

text: My name is Pythagoras, guardian and guide of this land. We are in dire need of your help, you see.
speaker: pythagoras

text: Once upon a time, the Calculus Chamber was a safe haven for all mathematicians. It was a peaceful place, welcoming to all people interested in learning math.
speaker: pythagoras

text: Anybody could learn, practice, and enjoy mathematics. It was a joyous time indeed.
speaker: pythagoras

text: However, everything changed when the Aureli Nation attacked...
speaker: pythagoras

text: They wreaked havoc across the Calculus Chamber, destroying our rules and learning material. They trashed the land, banished our forces, and let evil consume every corner of this place.
speaker: pythagoras

text: Over many long years, they diminished my power into that of a mere fairy. I am unable to fight them anymore.
speaker: pythagoras

text: We are in dire need of your help. It is up to you to defeat the Aureli Nation and restore peace to the Calculus Chamber!
speaker: pythagoras

text: It will be a dangerous and perilous path. Many before you have fallen without a trace. But I, Pythagoras, will guide you the way forward and teach you the ways of Calculus.
speaker: pythagoras

text: Now go, the future of the Calculus Chamber depends on you!
speaker: pythagoras
